code: var DateFunc=function DateFunc(rideDate){var dateValue=new Date(rideDate);var months=['Jan','Feb','Mar','Apr','May','June','July','Aug','Sep','Oct','Nov','Dec'];var month=months[dateValue.getMonth()];var year=dateValue.getFullYear();var day=dateValue.getDate();var hours=dateValue.getHours();var minutes=dateValue.getMinutes();return{day:day,month:month,year:year,hours:hours,minutes:minutes};};export default DateFunc;
